# Protein Purification System
### Solicitation Information
* **Solicitation Number:** 24-58040
* **Reference Number:** cb-130-53819577
* **Publication Date:** 2024-05-27
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2024-06-11T14:00:00 (Closed)
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** 2024-06-13
* **Expected Contract End Date:** 2024-07-19

### Description
The National Research Council of Canada (NRC) is soliciting a new protein purification system to replace an outdated instrument. The system must be capable of running multiple purification columns simultaneously and collecting eluted fractions automatically. The instrument must run on UNICORN software to ensure system compatibility and interchangeability with existing equipment at NRC. The protein purification system must be equipped with a UV monitor and an air monitor, and must be capable of running elution gradients.

### Technical Requirements
The protein purification system must meet the following technical requirements:
* Accurate protein purification and elution gradients
* Ability to run multiple purification columns simultaneously
* Automated collection of eluted fractions
* Compatibility with UNICORN software
* Ability to accommodate specific Cytiva protein purification columns
* Interchangeability with existing Cytiva AKTA Pure 25 L systems and Cytiva chromatography columns

### Evaluation Criteria
The tender will be evaluated based on the lowest price. Meetings and consultations with potential suppliers will be conducted in accordance with the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and other relevant trade agreements.
